member.name: T:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter
member.summary: Input adapter that reads measurements from a remote DNP3 endpoint.

member.name: M:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.CommsFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the XML file from which the communication parameters will be read.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.MappingFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the XML file from which the measurement mapping is read.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.MapQualityToStateFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if DNP3 quality flags should be mapped to measurement state flags.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.PublishFlagsAsSeparateMeasurements
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if DNP3 quality flags should be published as separate measurement outputs.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.TagMatchPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the regular expression pattern used to match tag names for quality flag outputs.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.QualityTagSuffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the suffix to append to the tag name for DNP3 quality flag measurement outputs.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.TimestampDifferentiation
member.summary: Gets or sets the time interval, in milliseconds, to insert between consecutive data points for a given signal that were received at the exact same time.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.PollingInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval, in seconds, at which the adapter will poll the DNP3 device.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if the data input connects asynchronously.
member.remarks: Derived classes should return true when data input source is connects asynchronously, otherwise return false.

member.name: M:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes

member.name: M:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.AttemptConnection
member.summary: Attempts to connect to data input source.
member.remarks: Derived classes should attempt connection to data input source here. Any exceptions thrown by this implementation will result in restart of the connection cycle.

member.name: M:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.AttemptDisconnection
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from data input source.
member.remarks: Derived classes should attempt disconnect from data input source here. Any exceptions thrown by this implementation will be reported to host via event.

member.name: M:DNP3Adapters.DNP3InputAdapter.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a short one-line status of this .
member.param: Maximum number of available characters for display.
member.returns: A short one-line summary of the current status of this .

member.summary: Gets or sets the port the DNP3 adapter will listen for master connections on.

member.summary: Gets or sets the IP address of the interface the DNP3 adapter will bind to for listening for master connections.

member.summary: Gets or sets a flag that determines if unsolicited responses are allowed.

member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if the DNP3 output adapter is configured as 'master' in the link configuration.

member.summary: Gets or sets the local address used for the link configuration.

member.summary: Gets or sets the remote address used for the link configuration.

member.summary: Gets or sets the response timeout, in milliseconds, used for the link configuration.

member.summary: Gets or sets the keep-alive timeout, in milliseconds, used for the link configuration.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.Dnp3OutputAdapter.UnsolicitedClassMask
member.summary: Gets or sets the unsolicited class mask. Format is four, comma separated booleans, e.g.: false, true, true, true.

member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if GSF measurement state flags should be mapped to DNP3 quality flags.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.Dnp3OutputAdapter.StaticUpdateBatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the batch size for static database updates.

member.name: P:DNP3Adapters.Dnp3OutputAdapter.MaxPublishRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum publish rate in milliseconds. This is used to throttle event publishing to the master stations when many events are being generated. Set to zero to publish events as fast as possible.

member.summary: Gets or sets the DNP3 log level for the server connection.

member.summary: Gets the count of static cache updates performed.

member.summary: Gets the count of events generated.

member.summary: Gets the current size of the static cache.

member.summary: Forces re-initialization of the DNP3 database with current cached values.
